page.title: 01D.BLOCK AROUND CARDINGTON
page.content: This very rural area in Shropshire has 1 village and 2 hamlets within its limits.It is quite high with superb views across Apedale looking towards Wenlok Edge.The north-west and western edges of the block are highest and parts of this are open moorland. Cardington village has been declared a conservation area and contains some lovely houses and cottages built of local stone.A number of the residents have chosen to live in this attractive area and commute to their employment in outlying towns. Population,apart from this village is sparse and most people are concerned with farming.Cardington is used as their centre for Social Activities as it has a Church,a pub and a village hall.
